text: Has multi-language support for sequences and templates ever been considered? I'm curious to learn whether that's in the roadmap at all...

Need to integrate multi language plugin on website. I added in header file <https://app.HubSpot.com/design-manager/2419901/code/95928190572?tfid=48559653041> but i can't see : {% global_partial path='@HubSpot/language_switcher.module' %}
Make sure you create multi-language variation of the page.
